data.name: Copycat
data.detailed_description:
Copycat is a narrative-driven indie game for PC and consoles—that’s perfect to cuddle up with on a rainy afternoon. The story follows the tale of Dawn, a sceptical shelter cat who would much rather hit the streets than be readopted again. But Dawn has second thoughts when she meets new owner Olive, a lonely older Aussie mourning the disappearance of her beloved furry companion. Together Dawn and Olive develop an intimate friendship, as two broken hearts mend one another and learn to beat as one.

In Copycat, you play as Dawn and see the world through her eyes as she faces magpies, mud, and garden gnomes. Wander alleyways, fences and rooftops as you learn about the true meaning of home. The game gives players the freedom to reflect on their own ideas on displacement and belonging. It also explores the value of the human-animal bond, and the moral question “when do humans become too old to look after their animals?”.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
